name: Chicken Breast
description: Boneless, skinless chicken breast - lean protein source

name: Ground Beef (80/20)
description: 80% lean, 20% fat ground beef - versatile for burgers, meatballs, etc.

name: Beef Sirloin Steak
description: Top sirloin beef cut - leaner than ribeye with good flavor

name: Pork Chop
description: Center cut, bone-in pork chop - moderate fat content

name: Bacon
description: Sliced pork belly cured with salt and spices - high fat content

name: Ground Turkey
description: Lean ground turkey - lower fat alternative to ground beef

name: Lamb Chop
description: Bone-in lamb rib or loin chop - distinctive flavor

name: Beef Ribeye Steak
description: Marbled ribeye cut - rich flavor due to high fat content

name: Pork Tenderloin
description: Lean, tender cut from the loin of the pig - low fat content

name: Beef Brisket
description: Tough cut that becomes tender with slow cooking - moderate fat content

name: Atlantic Salmon
description: Farm-raised Atlantic salmon fillet - high in omega-3 fatty acids

name: Tuna Steak
description: Fresh yellowfin tuna steak - lean protein source with firm texture

name: Cod Fillet
description: Wild-caught North Atlantic cod - mild flavor, flaky white flesh
